price: 67. Qofkii ka toobad keena (shirkiga iyo macaasida) oo (Xaqa) rumeeya oo raaca oo fala camallo wanaagsan (nolosha adduunkan) waa intaasoo uu ka mid ahaado liibaanayaasha.
arabic: فَأَمَّا مَن تَابَ وَءَامَنَ وَعَمِلَ صَٰلِحٗا فَعَسَىٰٓ أَن يَكُونَ مِنَ ٱلۡمُفۡلِحِينَ

version.title: Somali translation - Jacob
version.description: Translation of the meanings of the Noble Qur'an into the Somali language, translated by Abdullah Hasan Jacob.

meta.transliteration: fa-ammā man tāba waāmana waʿamila ṣāliḥan faʿasā an yakūna mina al-muf'liḥīna
